content: Website Twitter Telegram Bounty group 1. Bounty campaign will be managed by Crypto Networks Community 2. 4000$ PointGenieCoin are allocated for this Bounty. 3. The bounty program was launched on 06.04.2023 and will run until 07.05.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.Crypto Networks team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.General Rulesüó£Ô∏èAll Participants Must join PointGenieCoin Social Media And (Bounty Group) ¬†‚òÖOnce rejected he will not be accepted again Participants cannot change their wallet address after registration, Must be double check your wallet address before registration for any campaignüó£Ô∏èTalking About The Bounty in The Project Chat Group Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign And An Instant Ban From The Company Chat Groupüó£Ô∏èPlease Ask Your Bounty related Questions in the Crypto Networks Groupüó£Ô∏èPlease Note That Any Offensive or inappropriate Behavour Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign *Using Multiple Accounts, Cheating And Spanning Are Not Allowedüó£Ô∏èKYC not necessary for this campaign All Participants Must Send The Proof of Authentication Post To Join The Bounty Program ¬†And give a positive feedback in the comment.Important rule : You must be a ¬†Newbie with 50 minimum activityhttps://i.postimg.cc/3xn6T6sy/IMG-20230406-102617-396.jpgTwitter 50%Telegram 30%Facebook 20%Week 1: 06/04-13/04Week 2: 14/04-21/04Week 3: 22/04-29/04Week 4: 30/04-06/04Submit your weekly report on bounty threadTwitter Campaign 200 Members Facebook Campaign 130 Members Telegram Campaign 70 MembersRewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules: ¬†1. Every participant must follow PointGenieCoin Twitter Page,2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #localcityguide #pointgenieapp #pointgeniecoin hashtags in every retweet or tweet.JOIN NOW: https://forms.gle/FAkwts35iUCkf2W87Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | PointGenieCoin.(Example: Crypto Networks | PointGenieCoin)2. Replace your profile picture with PointGenieCoin.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange‚Äôs telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won‚Äôt be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear PointGenieCoin avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†avatar ¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† Download  ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†JOIN NOW: https://forms.gle/gyNmhYkzqhKjE3rC9Rules‚òÖMust follow the (PointGenieCoin) official Facebook page.‚òÖMust post 3 original post about (PointGenieCoin) using the hashtags #localcityguide #pointgenieapp #pointgeniecoinüó£Ô∏èMust shared and like 3 Firsted post by Asan verse every week.üó£Ô∏èMust have at least 500 real followers.üó£Ô∏èFollowers count will be fixed from your registration.üó£Ô∏èMinimum of 3 original post and 3 share on content and should be posted within the whole week not just in a dayRewards:500-1000 followers - 1 stakes1001-3000 folowers 2 stakes3001 5000 flowers- 3 stakes5001 - 10000 followers- 5 stakes10000+ followers 7 stakesJOIN NOW: https://forms.gle/fJ6Gwq7aeiv1g9jh6
